com.example.austin.inthemood

Class DataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.austin.inthemood.DataController

  • public class DataController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by olivier on 2017-03-10. This class contains a lot of main functionality used for manipulating our local and elastic search data. The data controller also contains the userList, an Array list of Users, with each user containing all his moods. The data controller also tracks the current user by setting a unique currentUserName to the username of the current user.

        password - corresponding password being checked for in database
        isOnline - a boolean indicating if the device is online

      • filterByMood

        public java.util.ArrayList<Mood> filterByMood(java.lang.String moodName,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<Mood> moodList)
        searches for moods with String moodName as a moodName and adds them to the filteredMoodList being returned
        Parameters:
        moodName - the moodName being searched for
        moodList - the list of moods being searched
        Returns:
        the list of moods filtered by particular mood. this returned list is also sorted by date

      • filterByWeek

        public java.util.ArrayList<Mood> filterByWeek(java.util.ArrayList<Mood> moodList)
        checks each mood to see if it was recorded in the last week. If so, it is added to the filteredMoodList being returned which is sorted by date pulled from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/883060/how-can-i-determine-if-a-date-is-between-two-dates-in-java on March 11, 2017
        Parameters:
        moodList - list of moods to be checked if the moods were recorded in the last week
        Returns:
        a list of moods recorded in the last week. this list is also sorted by date

      • filterByTrigger

        public java.util.ArrayList<Mood> filterByTrigger(java.lang.String moodTrigger,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<Mood> moodList)
        returns a list of moods from moodList that contains the string moodtrigger in the moodDescription
        Parameters:
        moodTrigger - the mood trigger description being searched for
        moodList - the list of moods that we are searching
        Returns:
        a list of moods containing moodTrigger in the moodDescription. This list is sorted by date

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFollowerRequests(User user)
        gets array list of user's follower requests that are stored in elasticSearch
        Parameters:
        user, - user with follower requests
        Returns:
        ESuser.getMyFollowerRequests(), array list of follower requests (usernames of requesting followers)

      • getFollowingList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFollowingList(User user)
        gets array list of user's follow requests that are stored in elasticSearch
        Parameters:
        user, - user with requests to follow other users
        Returns:
        ESuser.getMyFollowingRequests(), array list of follow requests (usernames of users being requested to follow by user)

        Returns:
